hindi:
चिंता ऐसी डाकिनी, काट कलेजा खाए।
वैद बेचारा क्या करे, कहा तक दवा लगाए।
english:
Chinta aisi dakini, kaat kaleja khaye.
Ved bechara kya kare, kaha tak dawa lagaye.
translation: Worry is like a bandit, who would cut out your heart and eat it. What can a helpless doctor do then, how deep can he apply the medicine.
